renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)        mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))         // rotation 
#define B(rx,ry,rz)   max(a.x-rx, max(a.y-ry,a.z-rz))      // box

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,m;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -12.*R.y) - R),          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,60), q,a,                           // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? 6.*iMouse.xyz/R -3.
              :  vec3( 1,.5,0) * cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
     
          
    for ( O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.005 )        // march scene
        q = p, 
        q.yz *= rot(-M.y),                                 // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-M.x-1.57), 
    //  m = 1.57 * smoothstep(6.,1.7, length(q)) ,  // close to the ref... but each turn adds to entanglement
        m = 3.14 * smoothstep(6.,1.7, length(q)) ,
    //  m = 3.14 * smoothstep(sqrt(6.),sqrt(1.7), sqrt(length(q)) ) ,
        q.yz *= rot( m * cos(iTime) ),
    //  m = 1.57 * smoothstep(4.3/2.,0., abs( length(q) - 7.7/2. ) ) ,
        q.xz *= rot( m * sin(iTime) ),
        a = abs(q),
        t =        B( 1., 1., 1.),                         // cube
        t = min(t, B(1e5, .3, .1)),                        // bands
        t = min(t, B( .3, .1,1e5)),
        t = min(t, B( .1,1e5, .3)),
        p += .2*t*D;                                       // step forward = dist to obj    
      

    O *= O*O*2.;                                           // color scheme
}
